title: ExaVault
description:
ExaVault's API allows you to incorporate ExaVault's suite of file transfer and user management tools into your own application.

ExaVault supports both POST (recommended when requesting large data sets) and GET operations, and requires an API key in order to use.

actions.title: authenticateUser
actions.description: Returns access token in the Response object

username.description: Name of of user to authenticate

actions.title: checkFilesExist
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Array containing paths of the files or folders to check

actions.title: copyResources
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'upload' permission.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Remote paths of the files or folders to copy

destinationPath.description: Remote destination path to copy files/folders to

actions.title: createFolder
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'upload' permission.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

folderName.description: Name of the folder to create

actions.title: createNotification
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'notification' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

path.description: Full path of file/folder where notification is set.

action.description: Type of action to filter on: 'upload', 'download', 'delete', 'all'

usernames.description: Array of usernames or with one flag to filter on: 'notice_user_all', 'notice_user_all_recipients', 'notice_user_all_users'

sendEmail.description: Set to true if the user should be notified by email when the notification is triggered.

emails.description: Email addresses to send notification to. If not specified, sends to owner by default.

actions.title: createShare
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

type.description: The type of share to create: shared_folder, send, receive.

filePaths.description: Array of strings containing the file paths to share.

accessMode.description: Type of permissions share recipients have: upload, download, download_upload, download_upload_modify, download_upload_modify_delete.

emails.description: Array of strings for email recipients (for email invitations).

requireEmail.description: Requires a user's email to access (defaults to false if not specified).

embed.description: Allows user to embed a widget with the share. Defaults to false if not specified.

isPublic.description: True if share has a public URL, otherwise defaults to false

password.description: If not null, value of password is required to access this Share

expiration.description: The date the current Share should expire, formatted YYYY-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

hasNotification.description: True if the user should be notified about activity on this Share.

notificationEmails.description: An array of recipients who should receive notification emails.

fileDropCreateFolders.description: If true, all receive folder submissions will be uploaded separate folders (only applicable for Receive folder types)

actions.title: createUser
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'manage users' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

username.description: Name of the subaccount user to create

permissions.description: A CSV string of user permissions. The following values are supported: upload, download, delete, modify, list, changePassword, share, notification.

timeZone.description: The user's timezone, used for accurate time display within SWFT. See this page for allowed values

expiration.description: The date when the user should expire, formatted YYYY-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

locked.description: If true, the user's account is locked by default

welcomeEmail.description: If true, send a user email upon creation

actions.title: deleteNotification
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'notification' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

id.description: ID of the Notification to delete.

actions.title: deleteResources
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'delete' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Array containing paths of the files or folder to delete

actions.title: deleteShare
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

id.description: ID of the Share to delete.

actions.title: deleteUser
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'manage users' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

username.description: Name of the subaccount user to delete

actions.title: getAccount
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getCurrentUser
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getDownloadFileUrl
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. URL points at the appropriate storage server for file download.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Path of file to be downloaded

downloadName.description: The name of the file to be downloaded

actions.title: getFileActivityLogs
actions.description: Returns a list of account activity. Allows for searching the activity log.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

offset.description: Starting record in the result set. Can be used for pagination.

sortBy.description: Sort method ['sort_logs_date' or 'sort_logs_ip_address' or 'sort_logs_username' or 'sort_logs_file' or 'sort_logs_file_source' or 'sort_logs_operation', or 'sort_logs_duration', or 'sort_logs_size', or 'sort_logs_protocol']

sortOrder.description: Sort in either ascending or descending order: asc, desc

filterBy.description: Field to search on ['filter_logs_date' or 'filter_logs_ip_address' or 'filter_logs_username' or 'filter_logs_operation' or 'filter_logs_file']

filter.description: Search criteria. For date ranges, use format 'start_date::end_date'

itemLimit.description: Number of logs to return. Can be used for pagination.

actions.title: getFolders
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getNotification
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'notification' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getNotificationActivity
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'notification' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getNotifications
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'notification' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

type.description: Type of notification to filter on: 'file', 'folder', 'shared_folder', 'send_receipt', 'share_receipt', 'file_drop'

sortBy.description: Sort by one of the following: 'sort_notifications_folder_name', 'sort_notifications_path', 'sort_notifications_date'

filter.description: Filter by the provided search terms.

actions.title: getResourceList
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'list files' permission.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

sortBy.description: Sort according to attribute: sort_files_name, sort_files_size, sort_files_date, sort_files_type, sort_files_timeline

sortOrder.description: Sort in either ascending or descending order: asc, desc

offset.description: Determines which item to start on for pagination

limit.description: The number of files to limit the result

detailed.description: If true, returns sharedFolder, notifications or other objects associated with specified path

pattern.description: Regex string. If not null, perform a search with specified pattern

actions.title: getResourceProperties
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Array containing paths of the files or folder to get

actions.title: getShare
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getShareActivity
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: getShares
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

type.description: The type of share to return: 'shared_folder', 'send', or 'receive'. If no argument specified, will return all Shares types.

sortBy.description: Sort by one of the following: 'sort_shares_name', 'sort_shares_date', 'sort_shares_user', 'sort_shares_access_mode'.

filter.description: Filter by the provided search terms.

include.description: Filter by all, active-only, or current user's only.

offset.description: Start position of results to return, for pagination.

limit.description: Maximum number of elements to return or 0 if no limit.

actions.title: getUploadFileUrl
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Called before an upload is started to get URL to appropriate storage server. Available to users with the 'write' permission.

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

fileSize.description: Size of the file to upload, in bytes

destinationPath.description: Path relative to account's home directory, including file name

allowOverwrite.description: True if the file should be overwritten, false if different file names should be generated

resume.description: True if upload resume is supported, false if it isn't

actions.title: getUser
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

username.description: Name of the subaccount user to get

actions.title: getUsers
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'manage users' permission set

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

actions.title: logoutUser
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Remote paths of the files or folders to move

destinationPath.description: Remote destination path to move files/folders to

actions.title: previewFile
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via authenticateUser operation

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

path.description: Path of the image relative to the user's home directory

size.description: The size of the image: small, medium, large

width.description: Overrides sizes. Sets to a specific width

height.description: Overrides sizes. Sets to a specific height

actions.title: renameResource
actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'modify' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePath.description: Remote path of the files or folder to rename

newName.description: The new name of the file or folder

actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'notification' permission

path.description: Full path of file/folder where notification is set.

action.description: Type of action to filter on: 'upload', 'download', 'delete', 'all'

usernames.description: Array of usernames or with one flag to filter on: 'notice_user_all', 'notice_user_all_recipients', 'notice_user_all_users'

emails.description: Email addresses to send notification to. If not specified, sends to owner by default.

sendEmail.description: Set to true if the user should be notified by email when the notification is triggered.

actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'share' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

filePaths.description: Array of strings containing the file paths to share.

accessMode.description: Type of permissions share recipients have: upload, download, download_upload, download_upload_modify, download_upload_modify_delete.

emails.description: Array of strings for email recipients (for email invitations).

requireEmail.description: Requires a user's email to access.

embed.description: Allows user to embed a widget with the share.

isPublic.description: True if share has a public URL, otherwise defaults to false

password.description: If not null, value of password is required to access this Share

fileDropCreateFolders.description: If true, all receive folder submissions will be uploaded separate folders (only applicable for Receive folder types)

actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'manage users' permission

access_token.description: Access token required to make the API call

userId.description: The user ID, must be obtained from getUser method first

username.description: Name of the subaccount user to modify

expiration.description: The date when use should expire in format: YYYY-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

locked.description: If true, the user's account is locked by default

permissions.description: A CSV string of user permissions.

actions.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with the 'manage users' permission
